mention.text: President Reagan 's national security adviser , Colin Powell

Powell , who plans to resume Colin Powell active duty military career when Reagan 's term ends Jan. 20 '' We can encourage steps that are clearly improvements in Soviet internal political practice , even if restive nationalities in the Soviet Union and around the Soviet empire do not correspond fully to what we know as democracy
Colin Powell active duty military career
an economic system that is not up to the demands of the 1990s and the 21st century
Gorbachev , who recently took on the additional title of president of the Soviet Union with the retirement of Andrei Gromyko
the changing political climate in the Soviet Union
the changing political climate in the Soviet Union
the changing political climate in the Soviet Union

an acknowledgment of the failure of the Soviet system to provide for its people Whether the changing political climate in the Soviet Union can be fixed as long as the changing political climate in the Soviet Union remains a communist , one-party system remains to be seen

its people Whether the changing political climate in the Soviet Union can be fixed as long as the changing political climate in the Soviet Union remains a communist , one-party system remains to be seen
restive nationalities in the Soviet Union and around the Soviet empire
restive nationalities in the Soviet Union and around the Soviet empire

remaining political prisoners in the Soviet Union _ as West German Chancellor Helmut Kohl had indicated following talks with Kremlin officials '' Our adversaries face a systemic crisis , '' Powell said '' Our adversaries sense that Our adversaries system is wrong
